name: Barefoot walk along the red clay mud trail
description: Kyejok Mountain is well known for its red clay mud trail. If you want to truly experience the serenity and peacefulness of the morning calm, this is the perfect place for you.  In addition, barefoot walking has numerous health benefts: improvement of blood circulation, healing of headache and insomnia etc. After mild or intense(the intensity of the trip is negotiable) walking, travellers will be escorted to korean mega spa known as Jjimjilbang, where travellers may stay overnight. Any additional changes to the plan is possible and I will try my best to accomodate your needs.
